mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.name, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM student_sign AS ss WHERE ss.sign_id = u.id AND ss.status < 3) AS signed, u.create_time, u.class_id, u.end_time FROM sign_list AS u WHERE u.class_id = #{classId} ORDER BY u.id DESC

SELECT u.id, u.name, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM student_sign AS ss WHERE ss.sign_id = u.id AND ss.status < 3) AS signed, u.create_time, u.class_id, u.end_time FROM sign_list AS u WHERE u.class_id = #{classId} ORDER BY u.id DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT u.id, u.name, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM student_sign AS ss WHERE ss.user_id = #{userId} AND ss.sign_id = u.id) AS signed, u.create_time, u.class_id, u.end_time FROM sign_list AS u WHERE u.class_id = #{classId} ORDER BY u.id DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT sl.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM student_sign AS ss WHERE ss.sign_id = sl.id AND ss.status = 1) AS signed, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM student_sign AS ss WHERE ss.sign_id = sl.id AND ss.status = 2) AS late, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM lin_user AS u LEFT JOIN student_sign AS ss ON u.id = ss.user_id WHERE ss.user_id is null AND u.id IN ( SELECT sc.user_id FROM student_class AS sc WHERE sc.class_id = ( SELECT sl.class_id from sign_list AS sl WHERE sl.id = #{signId} ) )) AS 'unSigned', (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM student_sign AS ss WHERE ss.sign_id = sl.id AND ss.status = 3) AS cancel FROM sign_list AS sl WHERE sl.id = #{signId}
